*{font-family:Epilogue,sans-serif;margin:0;padding:0}*,.header{box-sizing:border-box}.header{position:relative;background-color:#41197f;display:flex;align-items:center;width:100%;height:90px}.container-title{width:75%}.logo{width:250px;margin-left:30px}.title{color:#ddd;font-size:30px;padding-left:30px}.container-cartTitle{position:relative;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:space-evenly;padding:0 100px;background-color:#00d5e2;width:25%;height:100%}.container-cartTitle span{z-index:1}.container-cartTitle .cart__title{color:#41197f;font-size:20px;font-weight:700}.container{display:flex;width:100%;align-items:flex-start}.title strong{color:#fff}.products{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;width:75%;justify-content:center;margin:40px 0}.product{display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;margin:5px;width:270px;padding:13px;height:340px;border:1px solid #f0f0f0;border-radius:5px;box-sizing:border-box}.product:hover{box-shadow:0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.2)}.product .product__id{display:none}.product__title{display:-webkit-box;color:#393f47;font-size:12px;margin-top:8px;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;-webkit-line-clamp:4;-webkit-box-orient:vertical}.product .img__container{width:75%;height:100%;max-height:185px;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;overflow:hidden}.product .product__image{max-width:100%;max-height:100%;transition:transform .2s ease-in-out}.product:hover .product__image{transform:scale(1.1)}.price span,.product__price{align-self:flex-start;color:#a8a9ab;font-size:18px;display:flex;align-items:flex-end;margin:6px 0;flex-grow:1}.price span{flex-grow:0;margin:0 0 0 7px}.price,.price span span,.product__price .product__price__value{margin-left:6px;color:#242424;font-size:23px;font-weight:700}.price{display:flex;justify-content:center;width:100%;margin:15px 0}.product .product__add{background-color:#00d5e2;color:#fff;border:0;cursor:pointer;font-size:15px;font-weight:700;width:100%;padding:8px 10px;border-radius:5px;transition:box-shadow .2s ease}.product .product__add:hover{background-color:#19f4ff;box-shadow:0 0 .2rem #fff,0 0 .2rem #fff,0 0 1.2rem -5px #00d5e2,0 0 .8rem -5px #00d5e2,0 0 1.6rem -5px #00d5e2,inset 0 0 1.3rem #008aca}.cart{position:sticky;top:0;width:25%;height:740px;border-bottom-left-radius:7px;border:1px solid #f0f0f0;box-shadow:0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,.25)}.cart,.cart__products{display:flex;flex-direction:column}.cart__products{padding:10px 30px 30px;height:100%;list-style:none;overflow-y:scroll}.cart__product{padding:10px 0;margin:10px 0;height:85px;cursor:pointer}.cart__product,.cart__product__info-container{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:flex-start}.cart__product__info-container{flex-direction:column;width:100%;height:100px;padding:0 20px}.cart__product__info-container .product__price{margin:0}.cart__product__remove{background-color:transparent;border:0;font-size:20px;color:#a8a9ab;transition:color .2s ease}.cart__product:hover .cart__product__remove{color:#db2e2e}.cart__product__image-container{width:40%;height:100%;overflow:hidden;position:relative;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.cart__product__image-container img{position:absolute;max-width:100%;max-height:100%;transition:opacity .5s ease}.cart__product__image-container:hover img:first-child,.cart__product__image-container img:last-child{opacity:0}.cart__product__image-container:hover img:last-child{opacity:1}.cart-button{width:250px;height:30px;margin:0 auto;border:0;color:#fff;font-size:16px;font-weight:700;border-radius:5px;background-color:#41197f;cursor:pointer;transition:box-shadow .2s ease}.cart-button:hover{background-color:#6d29d4;box-shadow:0 0 .2rem #fff,0 0 .2rem #fff,0 0 1.4rem -5px #8330ff,0 0 .8rem -5px #8330ff,0 0 2.4rem -5px #8330ff,inset 0 0 2rem #3d0b88}.cep-input{width:250px;margin:20px auto 5px}.cart__address,.cep-input{font-size:16px;font-weight:700}.cart__address{height:30px;margin:10px auto}.hidden{display:none}footer{display:flex;justify-content:center;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;width:100%;height:100%;background-color:#41197f;color:#fff;font-size:10px;font-weight:700;margin:10px 0;padding:10px 0}footer img{margin:5px}a{color:#fff;text-decoration:none}::-webkit-scrollbar{width:8px}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background:#f3f3f3;box-shadow:inset 0 0 3px 1px #9b9b9b;border-radius:10px}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover{background:#88f4fa}::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background:#d6d6d6;border:3px solid #fff}@media screen and (max-width:1400px){.cart{height:630px}}
